# A list of apps/sites for PianoLab

## ðŸš€ More to come!

Yes.

This project uses the SSG Gatsby and Creative Tim's BLK design system.

The page pulls data from a static json file under src/data/posts.json with GraphQL query and <code><StaticQuery></code> component, then generates a list of buttons and project details.

## Build
<code>$ gatsbu build</code>

## Develop

<code>$ gatsby develop</code>
